entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
